pageContext.title: How a UK news publisher grew user registrations by 196% with OpenWeb
pageContext.excerpt: Digital publishers saw a huge increase in traffic in 2020, as people looked to stay informed, connected, or even distracted during these unprecedented times. Our new partner, a popular UK news publisher was able to leverage this traffic and drive long-term business growth by partnering with OpenWeb. Learn how we drove new user registrations.
pageContext.content:
Digital publishers saw a huge increase in traffic in 2020, as people looked to stay informed, connected, or even distracted during these unprecedented times.

Our new partner, a popular UK news publisher was able to leverage this traffic and drive long-term business growth by partnering with OpenWeb. Learn how we drove new user registrations.

seo.title: Build Your Community with Quality Conversations
seo.metaDesc: Itâ€™s time for quality conversations online. OpenWeb's community engagement and commenting system turns publishers into hosts, comments into conversations, and casual readers into active, vibrant communities.
